subject: Doping (Sports)
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Veterinary Medicine
lead_paragraph: The Kentucky Horse Racing Commission approved a limited ban on the race-day medication furosemide, also known as Lasix or Salix, in an effort to restore public confidence in the sport.
snippet: The Kentucky Horse Racing Commission approved a limited ban on the race-day medication furosemide, also known as Lasix or Salix, in an effort to restore public confidence in the sport.
